title: Portugal Elects a President, With Leftist Beating a Surging Far Right
summary_full: Despite a decisive victory for António José Seguro, a nationalist’s presence in the runoff showed that Portugal is not immune to Europe’s rising far-right tide.
summary_public: Despite a decisive victory for António José Seguro, a nationalist’s presence in the runoff showed that Portugal is not immune to Europe’s rising far-right tide.

PT.label: negative
PT.evidence: Portugal is not immune to Europe’s rising far-right tide
